title: Possible custom?
content:
Hello, I suspect this is a custom job but I thought I’d bounce it off of you all.  
Any suggestions are welcome. Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Galway1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172034/http:/typophile.com/files/Galway1.jpg) | 51.06 KB |

 [‹ ID help please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172034/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42821 "Go to previous forum topic") [Yearbook 2005 Jan Van Eyck dot type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172034/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42819 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Plan B

comments.content:
Amazingly close, and such that it helps greatly. Thanks!  
I’ve looked through all Vivaldi, Vivienne, and Vivacious  
fonts available as they are all strikingly similar.

They all seem to be missing the “solid” upper-case G.  
No matter, Illustrator to the rescue.

Many thanks, again.
